code: import React from'react';import'./WeatherForecast.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherForecast=_ref=>{let{forecast}=_ref;const formatDate=timestamp=>{const date=new Date(timestamp);const days=['Sun','Mon','Tue','Wed','Thu','Fri','Sat'];return days[date.getDay()];};const formatTemperature=temp=>{return Math.round(temp);};const getWeatherIcon=iconCode=>{return"https://openweathermap.org/img/wn/".concat(iconCode,"@2x.png");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-forecast",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"forecast-title",children:"5-Day Forecast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast-list",children:forecast.map((day,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast-day",children:formatDate(day.dt)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getWeatherIcon(day.weather[0].icon),alt:day.weather[0].description})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-temp",children:[formatTemperature(day.main.temp),"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"forecast-description",children:day.weather[0].description.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+day.weather[0].description.slice(1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"detail-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCA7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[day.main.humidity,"%"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"forecast-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"detail-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDCA8"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[Math.round(day.wind.speed*3.6)," km/h"]})]})]})]},index))})]});};export default WeatherForecast;
